DM19S1

Class DonorDirectory

  • java.lang.Object
    • DM19S1.DonorDirectory

  • public class DonorDirectory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to enter valid donor records into the directory. It also contains methods for deleting, quering and sorting donors based on their name and birthday.
    Author:
    Tushar
